item.title: 泰国总理要求副总理解释诈骗关联指控
item.description: 泰国总理阿努廷-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）表示，他已要求财政部副部长沃拉帕-坦亚翁（Vorapak Tanyawong）就有关他与东南亚诈骗网络有关联的指控作出书面回应。【原文：Thailand’s Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul said he’s asked Deputy Finance Minister Vorapak Tanyawong for a written response to allegations that he’s linked to Southeast Asian scam networks.】

item.title: 中国海上风电企业勇往直前，西方企业却节节败退
item.description:
一旦行业恢复增长，各公司都将自身定位为抢占新业务。【原文：

Companies are positioning themselves to seize new business once the industry returns to growth.

】

item.title: 走在中美之间的钢丝绳上
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注澳大利亚的稀土外交。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Australia’s rare earths diplomacy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 收益抵消债务担忧，法国股市再创新高
item.description: 由于强劲的企业盈利抵消了人们对该国政治动荡和信贷前景的担忧，法国股市升破了 2024 年 5 月的收盘纪录高点。【原文：French stocks rose above a May 2024 record closing high as strong corporate earnings offset concerns about the country’s political turmoil and its credit outlook.】

item.title: 斯帕克、科斯拉和红杉支持将人工智能引入税收征管的初创公司
item.description: 投资者正将赌注押在新的软件工具上，以解决商业和生活中最棘手的问题之一--税收。【原文：Investors are betting on new software tools to grapple with one of the thorniest problems in business and life — taxes.】

item.title: 中国的港口优势为其经济影响力增添战略筹码
item.description: 中国花费 20 年时间建立了一个遍布全球的港口网络，为其提供了商业影响力和潜在的战略杠杆。【原文：China has spent two decades building a globe-spanning port network that offers it commercial reach — and potential strategic leverage.】

item.title: 拉加德称资本市场联盟是能源转型的关键
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲需要更深入的资本市场来应对气候变化。【原文：Europe needs deeper capital markets to stem its response to climate change, according to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 联合健康的 "Optum Real "利用人工智能加快医疗报销速度
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. is testing a new system to streamline how medical claims are processed, an early example of what the company says is the potential for artificial intelligence to smooth out friction in billing.】

item.title: Insight 旗下 Veeam 同意以 17 亿美元收购 Securiti AI
item.description: 私募股权公司 Insight Partners 旗下的 Veeam Software 同意以约 17.3 亿美元的现金和股票收购 Securiti AI，增加了一款有助于保护人工智能应用中使用的企业数据安全的软件。【原文：Veeam Software, owned by private equity firm Insight Partners, agreed to buy Securiti AI for about $1.73 billion in cash and stock, adding software that helps secure corporate data used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: RTX 因航空航天和国防利润增长而上调业绩展望
item.description: RTX 公司上调了全年利润展望，并公布了第三季度财报，由于其商用航空航天和军用硬件业务的销售额和利润均有所增长，该公司的盈利超出了华尔街预期。【原文：RTX Corp. raised its full-year profit outlook and reported third-quarter earnings that topped Wall Street expectations as sales and profit rose across its commercial aerospace and military hardware businesses.】

item.title: 土耳其政治镇压让投资者乐观转为绝望
item.description: 持续不断的政治镇压和针对反对派人士的诉讼正在扼杀投资者对土耳其金融市场出现决定性转机的希望。【原文：A constant stream of political crackdowns and lawsuits against opposition figures is snuffing out investors’ hopes of an decisive turnaround in Turkish financial markets.】

item.title: CoreWeave 首席执行官 Intrator 表示不会提高对 Core Scientific 的出价
item.description: 尽管遭到主要股东的反对，但 CoreWeave 公司不会提高其对数据中心提供商 Core Scientific 公司 90 亿美元的收购报价。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. won’t increase its $9 billion offer for data center provider Core Scientific Inc., despite opposition to the deal from major shareholders.】

item.title: Coinbase 以 3.75 亿美元收购投资平台 Echo
item.description: Coinbase Global 公司表示，它以约 3.75 亿美元的价格收购了加密货币投资平台 Echo，扩大了数字资产交易所在私人市场的业务范围。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. said it acquired crypto investment platform Echo for about $375 million, expanding the digital-asset exchange’s footprint in private markets.】

item.title: 通用汽车上调业绩展望，卡车需求强劲缓解关税压力
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors Co.）上调了全年业绩展望，并公布了高于华尔街预期的第三季度业绩，原因是皮卡销量好于预期，以及特朗普政府对汽车零部件征收关税的新措施。【原文：General Motors Co. raised its full-year outlook and posted third-quarter results that topped Wall Street estimates on better—than-expected pickup truck sales and fresh relief from the Trump administration’s tariffs on auto parts.】

item.title: 德国监察机构未发现电价飙升的市场滥用迹象
item.description: 德国电网监管机构和反垄断局没有发现与去年冬季电价飙升有关的市场滥用证据，当时还限制了发电量，但一些调查仍在进行中。【原文：Germany’s grid regulator and antitrust office have found no evidence of market abuse in connection with power price spikes last winter — when there were capacity curbs — though some investigations are ongoing.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮将公用事业从避风港变为飙升的成长股
item.description: 过去几年，人工智能交易推动 S&P 500 指数创下一个又一个纪录，正在将传统上昏昏欲睡的公用事业股转变为蓬勃发展的成长股。【原文：The artificial intelligence trade that has driven the S&P 500 Index to one record after another over the past few years is transforming traditionally sleepy utilities stocks into booming growth plays.】

item.title: 卖空者是股市持续反弹的重要原因
item.description:
本月一篮子缩减幅度最大的股票大涨了16%，超过了S&P 500指数0.7%的涨幅。【原文：

A basket of the most-shorted stocks has surged 16% this month, beating the S&P 500’s 0.7% advance.

】

item.title: 南非获得首个跟踪天气风险的气候指数
item.description: 南非精算师推出了该国首个针对具体国家的气候指数，专家们正努力管理日益频繁的干旱、火灾、洪水和其他极端天气事件带来的风险和损失。【原文：South African actuaries launched the nation’s first country-specific climate index as experts seek to manage risks and losses brought about by an increasing frequency of droughts, fires, floods and other extreme weather events.】

item.title: 苹果在数字法律最大的法庭测试中抨击欧盟的打压行为
item.description: 苹果公司对欧盟试图驯服硅谷的力量进行了抨击，这是对欧盟大科技反垄断规则影响最深远的一次法律挑战。【原文：Apple Inc. lashed out at the European Union’s attempts to tame the power of Silicon Valley in the most far-reaching legal challenge of the bloc’s Big Tech antitrust rules.】

item.title: OpenAI 聘请前高盛员工帮助减少初级银行家的粗活
item.description: OpenAI 有 100 多名前投资银行家在帮助其训练人工智能如何建立金融模型，因为它希望取代整个行业初级银行家的繁重工作。【原文：OpenAI has more than 100 ex-investment bankers helping train its artificial intelligence on how to build financial models as it looks to replace the hours of grunt work performed by junior bankers across the industry.】

item.title: 监督机构称诺和诺德股价下跌扭曲了丹麦消费者情绪
item.description: 丹麦财政监督机构称，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的衰退可能会进一步打击丹麦消费者的信心，该制药商股价的下滑有可能加深悲观情绪，并使经济的实际实力蒙上阴影。【原文：The downturn at Novo Nordisk A/S could deal a further blow to Danish consumer confidence, with the drugmaker’s slumping shares threatening to deepen pessimism and cloud the economy’s real strength, according to Denmark’s fiscal watchdog.】

item.title: 泰国企业警告泰铢走强意味着输给越南
item.description: 泰国最大的制造商集团敦促央行抑制泰铢的强势，以减轻已被美国关税压垮的企业的痛苦。【原文：Thailand’s largest group of manufacturers urged the central bank to curb the baht’s strength to lessen the pain for businesses already being crushed by US tariffs.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行称，继萨瓦德尔之后，BBVA 的回购规模将达到 35 亿欧元
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）分析师表示，随着 BBVA SA 收购西班牙同业萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的尝试失败，该银行应启动一项新的回购计划，金额约为 35 亿欧元（40 亿美元）。【原文：As BBVA SA moves on from its failed attempt to buy Spanish peer Banco Sabadell SA the lender should launch a new buy back plan of some €3.5 billion ($4 billion), Barclays analysts said.】

item.title: 苹果供应商鸿海委托银行首次出售欧元债券
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司已委托银行，并将于本周举行投资者电话会议，为这家苹果公司的供应商首次出售欧元债券做准备。【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd. has mandated banks and is set to hold investor calls this week ahead of a debut euro bond sale by the Apple Inc. supplier.】

item.title: 高盛的莫拉维说资产类别相关性看起来很奇怪
item.description: 资产类别之间的相对走势异常，连最老练的股市交易员都感到困惑。【原文：Asset classes are moving unusually relative to one another, puzzling even the most seasoned equity market traders.】

item.title: 旅游网站 GetYourGuide 在大流行后销售额接近 10 亿欧元
item.description: GetYourGuide 表示，在这家拥有 16 年历史的在线旅游运营商的业务从大流行病期间的急剧放缓中恢复过来后，它首次实现了盈利，净收入接近 10 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：GetYourGuide said it’s become profitable for the first time and is nearing €1 billion ($1.2 billion) in net revenue after the 16-year-old online travel operator’s business recovered from a drastic slowdown during the pandemic period.】

item.title: 日本首相高市仅任命两名女性为内阁成员
item.description: 日本第一位女首相高市真奈只任命了另外两名女性进入内阁，远低于近几届政府中最高的五名女性，但值得注意的是，她提名了日本第一位女性财政部长。【原文：Japan’s first female prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, appointed just two other women to her cabinet, well below the high of five in other recent administrations but notable for her nomination of the nation’s first female finance minister.】

item.title: 国际金融公司（IFC）与 Appian Capital 合作，启动 10 亿美元矿业闪电战
item.description: Appian Capital Advisory 是一家专注于矿业的顶级私募股权投资公司，该公司宣布与世界银行的私营部门机构合作，出资 10 亿美元支持主要位于非洲和拉丁美洲的项目。【原文：Appian Capital Advisory, a top mining-focused private equity firm, announced a $1 billion partnership with the World Bank’s private sector arm to back projects mainly in Africa and Latin America.】

item.title: Var Energi 预计 2026 年石油价格将因投资减少而趋于稳定
item.description: 挪威第三大石油天然气公司Var Energi ASA认为，明年石油供需前景将趋于稳定，价格不会大幅跌破每桶60美元。【原文：Var Energi ASA, Norway’s third-biggest oil and gas company, sees oil’s supply and demand outlook stabilizing next year, with prices not dropping significantly below $60 a barrel.】

item.title: 高盛篮子显示空头本月痛苦不堪
item.description: 最近，当美国股市在挥之不去的不确定性面前从下跌中复苏时，往往会有一个激进的买家潜伏在股市走高的背后，那就是陷入挤压的卖空者。【原文：When the US stock market recovers from selloffs in the face of lingering uncertainty these days, there’s often an aggressive buyer lurking beneath the moves higher: short-sellers caught in a squeeze.】
